donor_name: UNAIDS - Unified Budget,Results and Accountablity Framework (UBRAF)
outputs.output_descr: Abilities of the state and civil society sector institutions to effectively plan, implement, monitor and evaluate national and sub-national multi-sectoral HIV/AIDS strategies and action plans and to promote healthy life style with the focus on youth strengthened

donor_name: UNAIDS - Unified Budget,Results and Accountablity Framework (UBRAF)
outputs.output_descr: Public sector institutions strengthened in protecting the human rights of people affected by HIV/AIDS, especially youth; gender and HIV linkages addressed in policies and plans; and equal access to prevention, treatment, care and support services for men who have sex with men and transgender people provided

The Project strengthens abilities of the state and civil society sector institutions to ensure high quality diagnostic and treatment of the tuberculosis, as one of the HIV opportunistic infections, including at the regional level

project_descr: Strengthening National Capacity for Effective HIV/AIDS Response in Ukraine
project_title: Strengthening National Capacity for Effective HIV/AIDS R
